trans-unit.source: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: 窗体和可以容纳一个或多个控件的中间面板的每一侧提供面板。

trans-unit.source: ToolStripContainer is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

It uses four docked side panels (instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) and one central panel (an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) to create a typical arrangement.
trans-unit.target: 它使用四个停靠的侧面板 (的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) 和一个中间面板 (实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) 若要创建典型的排列方式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 无法删除侧面板中，但您可以通过设置各自隐藏它们<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，上述每个属性是`true`在设计时。

trans-unit.source: Also at design time, the ToolStripContainer appears with its top panel already expanded.
trans-unit.target: 此外在设计时，ToolStripContainer 与尚未展开其顶部面板一起显示。

trans-unit.source: You can neither remove nor hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

You can arrange one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个可以排列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控件在侧面板中，并且你可以将其他控件使用中间面板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>还使您能够获取到一致的外观窗体的正文的呈现器的支持。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripContainer does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripContainer 不支持多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> for MDI applications.

To be added.
Gets the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

Use the BottomToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BottomToolStripPanel 属性将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控制或将它们从另一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>移</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip></xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel"></xref> representing the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否的底部面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>可见。

trans-unit.source: Set the BottomToolStripPanelVisible property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a bottom panel.
trans-unit.target: 将 BottomToolStripPanelVisible 属性设置为`false`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>无底部面板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the bottom panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果的底部面板<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>可见; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets the center panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用顶部、 底部、 左侧和右侧面板的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>来保存<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>

trans-unit.source: Controls other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> are automatically added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel"></xref> representing the center panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"></xref> event.
The event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnSizeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSizeChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
Gets the right panel of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.

Use the RightToolStripPanel property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
